title: Remove Languages/Notifications from navigation and add '+' create-goal button

requirements.summary: Remove Languages/Notifications from the mobile bottom navigation and ensure the layout adapts cleanly to fewer items.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile, the bottom navigation no longer shows 'Languages' or 'Notifications'.
The bottom navigation layout adapts to the new number of items (no 7-column grid with empty space; spacing and touch targets remain consistent).
No other navigation items are removed or renamed.

file_operations.description: Remove the '/languages' and '/notifications' nav items and their icons, and update the bottom-nav layout to be item-count adaptive (e.g., switch from a fixed 7-column grid to a flexible layout or an appropriate fixed column count matching the remaining items) so there are no empty columns or misalignment on mobile.

requirements.summary: Remove the Languages and Notifications routes so the router no longer registers them.
acceptanceCriteria: The router no longer defines routes for '/languages' and '/notifications'.
Navigating to '/languages' or '/notifications' via manual URL entry does not render the removed placeholder pages (it should fall back to the router's default not-found/route-missing behavior).
No other routes are impacted (e.g., '/', '/create', '/stats', '/settings', '/profile', '/averages' continue to work).

file_operations.description: Remove imports and route registrations for LanguagesPage and NotificationsPage, and ensure the route tree no longer includes '/languages' or '/notifications' while keeping all other routes unchanged.
Delete the placeholder Languages page so it cannot be rendered by any remaining navigation or accidental imports.
Delete the placeholder Notifications page so it cannot be rendered by any remaining navigation or accidental imports.

requirements.summary: Add a visible '+' control on the goals dashboard that navigates to the existing '/create' goal creation flow.
acceptanceCriteria: A '+' (plus) control is visible from the goals dashboard experience and is usable on mobile.
The existing Create Goal page and goal creation flow remain unchanged and continue to work.

file_operations.description: Create a reusable '+' add-goal control (e.g., a compact icon button or mobile-friendly floating action button) that navigates to '/create' when activated, using existing routing utilities and existing UI primitives (do not modify anything under frontend/src/components/ui).

Render the new AddGoalButton on the goals dashboard so it is clearly discoverable on mobile (including when the list is non-empty), and wire it to navigate to '/create' without changing the existing create-goal flow.
